eu.hydrologis.jgrass.uibuilder.renderers
Interface Renderer

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractSWTRenderer, CheckBoxFieldRenderer, CommandFieldRenderer, DoubleFieldRenderer, ExclusiveOptionFieldRenderer, FileChooserFieldRenderer, InputFieldRenderer, IntegerFieldRenderer, JGrassRasterMapChooserRenderer, OptionFieldRenderer, StringFieldRenderer
public interface Renderer

An object that can be rendered in the UI.

Author:
Patrick Ohnewein

Method Summary
 boolean hasLabelComponent()
          If this renderer has a label component the renderLabelComponent(Object parent, Object contraints) method will render one.
 boolean hasValueComponent()
          If this renderer has a value component the renderValueComponent(Object parent, Object contraints) method will render one.
 boolean isContainer()
          Is the value component, rendered by renderValueComponent(Object parent, Object contraints), a container and can it contain other components (i.e. it's children).
 java.lang.Object renderLabelComponent(java.lang.Object parent, java.lang.Object contraints)
          Get the label component associated with this object.
 java.lang.Object renderValueComponent(java.lang.Object parent, java.lang.Object constraints)
          Get the value component associated with this object.
 void setEnabled(boolean enabled)
          Enable or disable the object.
 

Method Detail

hasLabelComponent

boolean hasLabelComponent()
If this renderer has a label component the renderLabelComponent(Object parent, Object contraints) method will render one.

Returns:
true if this renderer can render a label component.

renderLabelComponent

java.lang.Object renderLabelComponent(java.lang.Object parent,
                                      java.lang.Object contraints)
Get the label component associated with this object.

Parameters:
parent - The parent container into which the label has to be rendered.
contraints - Informations about how the LayoutManager of the parent container should layout this component.
Returns:
an object representing a label component, or null if no label is needed

hasValueComponent

boolean hasValueComponent()
If this renderer has a value component the renderValueComponent(Object parent, Object contraints) method will render one.

Returns:
true if this renderer can render a value component.

renderValueComponent

java.lang.Object renderValueComponent(java.lang.Object parent,
                                      java.lang.Object constraints)
Get the value component associated with this object.

Parameters:
parent - The parent container into which the value component has to be rendered.
contraints - Informations about how the LayoutManager of the parent container should layout this component.
Returns:
an object representing a value component

isContainer

boolean isContainer()
Is the value component, rendered by renderValueComponent(Object parent, Object contraints), a container and can it contain other components (i.e. it's children).

Returns:
true value component is a container.

setEnabled

void setEnabled(boolean enabled)
Enable or disable the object.

Parameters:
enabled - whether the object should be enabled or not
